metadata.title: CVE-2011-0740 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability inmagpie/scripts/magpie_slashbox.php in RSS Feed Reader 0.1 for WordPressallows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via therss_url parameter.

criterions.comment: magpierss: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
